genresAdvancedInfo.name: tar
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A traditional Persian stringed instrument, similar to a lute, that has been used in Persian classical music for centuries. The tar has a rich, warm sound that is well-suited to the complex melodies and rhythms of Persian music. Skilled tar players are highly respected in Persian culture, and the instrument has been celebrated in poetry and literature for centuries.
